verses.verse: Then the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> Go <S%H935>in<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> and <S%H1696>tell<s%> <S%H413><s%> him, <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of the <S%H5680>Hebrews,<s%> <S%H853>Let<s%> my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7971>go,<s%> that they may <S%H5647>serve<s%> me.
For <S%H3588><s%> <S%H518>if<s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> <S%H3986>refuse<s%> to let them <S%H7971>go,<s%> and wilt <S%H2388>hold<s%> them <S%H5750>still,<s%>

Behold, <S%H2009><s%> the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1961>is<s%> upon thy <S%H4735>cattle<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is in the <S%H7704>field,<s%> upon the <S%H5483>horses,<s%> upon the <S%H2543>asses,<s%> upon the <S%H1581>camels,<s%> upon the <S%H1241>oxen,<s%> and upon the <S%H6629>sheep:<s%> there shall be a <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H3515>grievous<s%> <S%H1698>murrain.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H6395>sever<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> the <S%H4735>cattle<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> and the <S%H4735>cattle<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt:<s%> and there shall <S%H3808>nothing<s%> <S%H1697><s%> <S%H4191>die<s%> of <S%H4480>all<s%> <S%H3605><s%> that is the <S%H1121>children's<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7760>appointed<s%> a set <S%H4150>time,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H4279>Tomorrow<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1697>thing<s%> in the <S%H776>land.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H2088>that<s%> <S%H1697>thing<s%> on the <S%H4480>morrow,<s%> <S%H4283><s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4735>cattle<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> <S%H4191>died:<s%> but of the <S%H4480>cattle<s%> <S%H4735><s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H4191>died<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H259>one.<s%>

And <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H7971>sent,<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> there was <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> of the <S%H4480>cattle<s%> <S%H4735><s%> of the <S%H3478>Israelites<s%> <S%H4191>dead.<s%> And the <S%H3820>heart<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> was <S%H3513>hardened,<s%> and he did <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H853>let<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7971>go.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> <S%H3947>Take<s%> to you <S%H4393>handfuls<s%> <S%H2651><s%> of <S%H6368>ashes<s%> of the <S%H3536>furnace,<s%> and let <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H2236>sprinkle<s%> it toward the <S%H8064>heaven<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh.<s%>

And it shall <S%H1961>become<s%> small <S%H80>dust<s%> <S%H5921>in<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and shall <S%H1961>be<s%> a <S%H7822>boil<s%> breaking <S%H6524>forth<s%> with <S%H76>blains<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> <S%H120>man,<s%> and <S%H5921>upon<s%> <S%H929>beast,<s%> throughout <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

And they <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H6368>ashes<s%> of the <S%H3536>furnace,<s%> and <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh;<s%> and <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H2236>sprinkled<s%> it up toward <S%H8064>heaven;<s%> and it <S%H1961>became<s%> a <S%H7822>boil<s%> breaking <S%H6524>forth<s%> with <S%H76>blains<s%> upon <S%H120>man,<s%> and upon <S%H929>beast.<s%>

And the <S%H2748>magicians<s%> <S%H3201>could<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H5975>stand<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> because <S%H4480>of<s%> <S%H6440><s%> the <S%H7822>boils;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> the <S%H7822>boil<s%> <S%H1961>was<s%> upon the <S%H2748>magicians,<s%> and upon <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4714>Egyptians.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H2388>hardened<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3820>heart<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> and he <S%H8085>hearkened<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> them; <S%H834>as<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> had <S%H1696>spoken<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> Rise up <S%H7925>early<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning,<s%> and <S%H3320>stand<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> and <S%H559>say<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> him, <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of the <S%H5680>Hebrews,<s%> <S%H853>Let<s%> my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7971>go,<s%> that they may <S%H5647>serve<s%> me.

For <S%H3588><s%> <S%H589>I<s%> will at <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H6471>time<s%> <S%H7971>send<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> my <S%H4046>plagues<s%> <S%H413>upon<s%> thine <S%H3820>heart,<s%> and upon thy <S%H5650>servants,<s%> and upon thy <S%H5971>people;<s%> <S%H5668>that<s%> thou mayest <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> there is <S%H369>none<s%> like <S%H3644>me<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> <S%H6258>now<s%> I will stretch <S%H7971>out<s%> <S%H853><s%> my <S%H3027>hand,<s%> that I may <S%H5221>smite<s%> thee and thy <S%H5971>people<s%> with <S%H1698>pestilence;<s%> and thou shalt be cut <S%H3582>off<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

And in very <S%H199>deed<s%> <S%H5668>for<s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> cause have I raised thee <S%H5975>up,<s%> <S%H5668>for<s%> to <S%H7200>show<s%> in <S%H853>thee<s%> my <S%H3581>power;<s%> and <S%H4616>that<s%> my <S%H8034>name<s%> may be <S%H5608>declared<s%> throughout <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>earth.<s%>
As <S%H5750>yet<s%> exaltest thou <S%H5549>thyself<s%> against my <S%H5971>people,<s%> that thou wilt <S%H1115>not<s%> let them <S%H7971>go?<s%>

Behold, <S%H2009><s%> <S%H4279>tomorrow<s%> about this <S%H6256>time<s%> I will cause it to <S%H4305>rain<s%> a <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H3515>grievous<s%> <S%H1259>hail,<s%> <S%H834>such<s%> <S%H3644>as<s%> hath <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H1961>been<s%> in <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> <S%H4480>since<s%> <S%H3117><s%> the <S%H3245>foundation<s%> thereof even <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H6258>now.<s%>

Send <S%H7971><s%> therefore <S%H6258>now,<s%> and <S%H5756>gather<s%> <S%H853><s%> thy <S%H4735>cattle,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> thou hast in the <S%H7704>field;<s%> for upon <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> and <S%H929>beast<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> shall be <S%H4672>found<s%> in the <S%H7704>field,<s%> and shall <S%H3808>not<s%> be <S%H622>brought<s%> <S%H1004>home,<s%> the <S%H1259>hail<s%> shall come <S%H3381>down<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> them, and they shall <S%H4191>die.<s%>

He that <S%H3372>feared<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> among the <S%H4480>servants<s%> <S%H5650><s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H853>made<s%> his <S%H5650>servants<s%> and his <S%H4735>cattle<s%> <S%H5127>flee<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> the houses: <S%H1004><s%>

And he <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H7760>regarded<s%> <S%H3820><s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5800>left<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H5650>servants<s%> and his <S%H4735>cattle<s%> in the <S%H7704>field.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> Stretch <S%H5186>forth<s%> <S%H853><s%> thine <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H5921>toward<s%> <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> that there may <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H1259>hail<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> <S%H120>man,<s%> and <S%H5921>upon<s%> <S%H929>beast,<s%> and <S%H5921>upon<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H6212>herb<s%> of the <S%H7704>field,<s%> throughout the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> stretched <S%H5186>forth<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H4294>rod<s%> <S%H5921>toward<s%> <S%H8064>heaven:<s%> and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5414>sent<s%> <S%H6963>thunder<s%> and <S%H1259>hail,<s%> and the <S%H784>fire<s%> ran <S%H1980>along<s%> upon the <S%H776>ground;<s%> and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H4305>rained<s%> <S%H1259>hail<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

So there <S%H1961>was<s%> <S%H1259>hail,<s%> and <S%H784>fire<s%> <S%H3947>mingled<s%> <S%H8432>with<s%> the <S%H1259>hail,<s%> <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H3515>grievous,<s%> such <S%H834>as<s%> there <S%H1961>was<s%> <S%H3808>none<s%> like <S%H3644>it<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> <S%H4480>since<s%> <S%H227><s%> it <S%H1961>became<s%> a <S%H1471>nation.<s%>

And the <S%H1259>hail<s%> <S%H5221>smote<s%> throughout <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> was in the <S%H7704>field,<s%> both <S%H4480>man<s%> <S%H120><s%> and <S%H929>beast;<s%> and the <S%H1259>hail<s%> <S%H5221>smote<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H6212>herb<s%> of the <S%H7704>field,<s%> and <S%H7665>broke<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H6086>tree<s%> of the <S%H7704>field.<s%>

Only <S%H7535><s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H1657>Goshen,<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> were, <S%H1961>was<s%> there <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H1259>hail.<s%>

And <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H7971>sent,<s%> and <S%H7121>called<s%> for <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> them, I have <S%H2398>sinned<s%> this <S%H6471>time:<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is <S%H6662>righteous,<s%> and <S%H589>I<s%> and my <S%H5971>people<s%> are <S%H7563>wicked.<s%>

Entreat <S%H6279><s%> <S%H413><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> (for it is <S%H7227>enough)<s%> that there be <S%H4480>no<s%> <S%H1961><s%> more <S%H430>mighty<s%> <S%H6963>thunderings<s%> and <S%H1259>hail;<s%> and I will let you <S%H7971>go,<s%> and ye shall <S%H5975>stay<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H3254>longer.<s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> him, As soon as I am gone <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H853>of<s%> the <S%H5892>city,<s%> I will spread <S%H6566>abroad<s%> <S%H853><s%> my <S%H3709>hands<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> and the <S%H6963>thunder<s%> shall <S%H2308>cease,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall there <S%H1961>be<s%> any <S%H5750>more<s%> <S%H1259>hail;<s%> <S%H4616>that<s%> thou mayest <S%H3045>know<s%> how <S%H3588>that<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%> is the <S%H3068>LORD's.<s%>

But as for <S%H859>thee<s%> and thy <S%H5650>servants,<s%> I <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> ye will not <S%H2962>yet<s%> <S%H3372>fear<s%> <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God.<s%>
And the <S%H6594>flax<s%> and the <S%H8184>barley<s%> was <S%H5221>smitten:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> the <S%H8184>barley<s%> was in the <S%H24>ear,<s%> and the <S%H6594>flax<s%> was <S%H1392>bolled.<s%>
But the <S%H2406>wheat<s%> and the <S%H3698>rye<s%> were <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H5221>smitten:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H2007>they<s%> were not grown <S%H648>up.<s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> went <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H853>of<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H5973><s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> and spread <S%H6566>abroad<s%> his <S%H3709>hands<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> and the <S%H6963>thunders<s%> and <S%H1259>hail<s%> <S%H2308>ceased,<s%> and the <S%H4306>rain<s%> was <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H5413>poured<s%> upon the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

And when <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> the <S%H4306>rain<s%> and the <S%H1259>hail<s%> and the <S%H6963>thunders<s%> were <S%H2308>ceased,<s%> he <S%H2398>sinned<s%> yet <S%H3254>more,<s%> and <S%H3513>hardened<s%> his <S%H3820>heart,<s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> and his <S%H5650>servants.<s%>

And the <S%H3820>heart<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> was <S%H2388>hardened,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> would he <S%H853>let<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7971>go;<s%> <S%H834>as<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> had <S%H1696>spoken<s%> <S%H3027>by<s%> <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>
